update rc_order_payment
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PAYMENT_INTERFACE = #{paymentInterface,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ORDER_PAYMENT_ID = #{orderPaymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_PAYMENT_ID, ORDER_ID, PAYMENT_INTERFACE, PAYMENT_TYPE, TRANSACTION_ID, THIRD_PARTY_TRANSACTION_ID, PAY_CODE, AMOUNT, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, FINISH_TIME from rc_order_payment where ORDER_PAYMENT_ID = #{orderPaymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
